frontmatter.title: HTTPoison and Decompression
frontmatter.excerpt:
I learned the hard way that the popular HTTP client for Elixir doesn't
automatically decompress or re-encode responses. I had to fix it myself.

frontmatter.title: DateTimeParser on Elixir Mix podcast
frontmatter.excerpt:
I was invited to talk on the Elixir Mix podcast. We talked about the Elixir
community, how to contribute, and the DateTimeParser library I released.
